metadata.title: CVE-2022-21418 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:InnoDB). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.28 and prior.Difficult to exploit vulnerability allows high privileged attacker withnetwork access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized abilityto cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQLServer as well as unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some ofMySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 5.0 (Integrity andAvailability impacts). CVSS Vector:(CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:H).

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.1 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
